title: Predicting flight ticket prices using ML
description: This project made to predict the flight prices using techinques like linear, bagging regression, Regression SVM(Linear , polynomial) and multilayer perceptron.

title: Design and implementation of custom function configuration using Linux
description: This project is made to get system configuration in linux OS using a single command. Generated a .iso file at the end.

title: EcoEcho - A species identifying web application
description: This project made to identify which species the uploaded animal belongs to. Used flask framework and AWS.

title: Capturing perpetrators
description: This is a project made to identify the criminals using their facial recognition and hand gestures. Created a dataset full of images and classified those with the IBM classifier. Used AWS Image Rekognition and SNS services.
